item.title: Bangalore to Ghati Short Trip Guide: One-Day Itinerary
item.description: A one-day trip from Bangalore to Ghati Subramanya is perfect whether you are riding solo on a motorbike or driving with family in a car. Ghati Subramanya is an ancient Hindu temple, located about 50 kilometers from Bangalore towards Doddaballapur, making it ideal for a short morning getaway. The temple is surrounded by scenic village roads and offers a peaceful spiritual experience combined with a
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
